newsitem.title: JAPAN: Far East Cons says eyes resorts, housing in Japan.
newsitem.headline: Far East Cons says eyes resorts, housing in Japan.

text.p: Far East Consortium International Ltd is considering doing business in the resort and housing sectors in Japan through its tie-up with Tokai Kanko Co Ltd, Far East president Kohei Ogawa said on Thursday.
Japanese hotel chain operator Tokai Kanko said earlier on Thursday that it had decided on an equity and business tie-up with Far East Consortium.
Tokai Kanko also said Ogawa, president of both Far East Consortium and Far East Global Asia, would become Tokai Kanko's president on September 17.
The Japanese company said it would issue 54 million new shares to Far East Global Asia Ltd, making the company the largest shareholder in Tokai Kanko at 51.6 percent.
